sense.def:
One's environment
je vse okoli nas, kar vpliva na naše vsakdanje življenje, na primer kraj, kjer živimo, ter ljudje in stvari, ki delujejo na nas.

seg.quote: Could the college provide a stimulating environment?
Are we more influenced by environment or heredity?

sense.def:
The environment
je narava na svetu, kopno, morje, rastline in živali.

seg.quote: We are fighting pollution to protect the environment.
